message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Let's meet in the middle, 55-45 is a fair compromise.
I can do 57.5-42.5, it's as low as I'm willing to go for now.
Still not meeting in the middle, 52-48 is a more reasonable compromise.
I'll meet you closer to the middle, 56.25-43.75 is my new offer.
Come on, Alice, 51-49 is basically a fair split. Don't let inflation eat away our money!
